CustomField.description: If selected, in the Time Entry page, when users click or tab out of task time cells or manually enter zero, the project/assignment value is updated to zero. The default value is false. Task Time Entry Mode must be set to Calculated.
CustomField.inlineHelpText: If selected, in the Time Entry page, when users click or tab out of task time cells or manually enter zero, the project/assignment value is updated to zero. The default value is false. Task Time Entry Mode must be set to Calculated.
CustomField.label: Allow Zero Entry
